ðŸ“– Summary: WebScrapBook is a browser extension designed to capture web pages faithfully in various archive formats. It allows users to retrieve, organize, annotate, and edit captured web content locally or on a backend server. The project is a successor to the ScrapBook X Firefox add-on.
